Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1213 ELKO DRIVE, SUNNYVALE, California, 94089, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Founded in 1995 GSI Technology Inc. is a leading provider of semiconductor memory solutions. GSIs resources are currently focused on bringing new products to market that leverage existing core strengths including radiation-hardened memory products for extreme environments and Gemini the APU designed to deliver performance advantages for diverse artificial intelligence applications. GSI Technology is headquartered in Sunnyvale California and has sales offices in the Americas Europe and Asia.
